text: inanite yamenachihu hoyi! betegedelu sewochi mamesaseli benanite layi tets’afe፡፡ nets’a benets’a bariyami bebariya setimi beseti (yigedelalu)፡፡ le’irisumi (legedayu) kewenidimu (demi) tinishi negeri mihireti yetederegeleti sewi (bemehariwi layi gumawini) bemelikami meketateli wederisumi (wede mehariwi) gedayu bemelikami akwahwani mekifeli alebachewi፡፡ yihi kegetachihu yehone mak’alelina izineti newi፡፡ kezihimi behwala higini yetelalefe sewi lerisu asamami k’it’ati alewi፡፡
